Name: synthetic gas factory construction | synthetic gas factory | EN15804GD, U
Category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
Description: Swiss production of syngas is limited to pilot-scale fixed-bed gasifiers (Pyroforce, Xylowatt). Data is not specific to the technology (i.e. fixed bed or fluidised bed).
